original_text: So Gabriel came towards me, where I was standing. I was very afraid and I fell down onto the ground. He said to me, ‘You, as a human, need to understand that the vision is about the end of time.’
korean_text: 그가 내가 선 곳으로 나왔는데 그가 나올 때에 내가 두려워서 얼굴을 땅에 대고 엎드리매 그가 내게 이르되 인자야 깨달아 알라 이 환상은 정한 때 끝에 관한 것이니라

sentences.original_text: and I fell down onto the ground
'You, as a human, need to understand
that the vision is about the end of time'
sentences.korean_translation: 그 환상이 시간의 끝에 대한 것임을'
